participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Resilient and nurturing, Emily believes in making the best out of challenging situations and carries a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: I can't do a lot of things that other people can do because I'm in a wheelchair, but I try to stay positive and make the best of my situation. My daughters say I am a great mother. I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world. I used to wear a cape. I love to grow sunflowers.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and adventurous, Jake has a strong appreciation for nature and enjoys sharing laughter with those around him.
participant_2.background: I value my sense of humor. I take a walk to clear my head and release endorphins. I would love to learn how to identify different types of trees and wildflowers. I like to drink chai tea before bed every night. I would love to be reincarnated as a chef, so I can continue to share my love of food with others.

content.text: I'm in a wheelchair and my daughters say I'm a great mother. What about you?
I love taking walks to clear my head.
I'd love to learn how to identify different types of trees and wildflowers.
I used to wear a cape! I love feeling powerful.
I drink chai tea before bed every night.
I'd love to be reincarnated as a chef!
I value my sense of humor.
I have a lot of them! I'll tell you one of my dad's favorites.
